en.title: How Vocal Are Siberian Cats? Characteristics of a Quiet and Easy-to-Keep Breed
en.content:
When welcoming a cat, the volume and frequency of meowing is a key consideration. This is especially important for those living in apartments.

Characteristics of the Siberian's Voice

Siberians are known as a relatively quiet breed. They rarely meow unnecessarily, and their voice tends to be moderate and gentle in tone. It is often said that their voice is surprisingly cute for their large body size.

Rich in Communication

While they are a quiet breed, Siberians love communicating with their owners. They chirp and trill softly, purr contentedly, and express their feelings in gentle ways.

Why They Are Suitable for Apartment Living

In addition to their gentle vocalizations, Siberians have a calm temperament, making them well-suited for apartment and condominium living. Of course, individual differences exist, but kittens that have received proper socialization from a breeder tend to be even more relaxed.

zh.title: 西伯利亚猫的叫声大吗？安静好养的猫种特点
zh.content:
迎接猫咪时，叫声的大小和频率是很多人关心的问题。对于住在公寓的朋友来说尤为重要。

西伯利亚猫叫声的特点

西伯利亚猫是相对安静的猫种。它们很少无故叫唤，叫声也不会太大，通常音调温和。人们常说，以它们的体型来说，叫声出奇地可爱。

丰富的沟通方式

虽然是安静的猫种，但西伯利亚猫非常喜欢与主人交流。它们会发出轻柔的啾啾声、满足地打呼噜，用温和的方式表达自己的心情。

适合公寓饲养的原因

除了叫声温和之外，西伯利亚猫性格也很沉稳，因此非常适合在公寓等集合住宅中饲养。当然存在个体差异，但在繁育者那里接受过良好社会化训练的幼猫，通常会更加安静温顺。
